trans-unit.source: Defines an iterator that can access elements in a container in the forward direction by using the increment operator and in the backward direction by using the decrement operator.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个迭代器，它可以通过使用增量运算符正向访问容器中的元素，也可以通过使用减量运算符后向访问容器中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator points to can be both written to and read from any number of times.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器指向的元素可以写入和读出任意多次。

trans-unit.source: Bidirectional iterators can be used anywhere that an input or output iterator is required.
trans-unit.target: 无论是需要输入迭代器还是输出迭代器，均可以使用双向迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 分配并初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 分配并初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object from an existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 从现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象分配并初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The node that the iterator will point to.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器将指向的节点。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object that points to the given node.
trans-unit.target: 分配并初始化指向给定节点的新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that the iterator is traversing.
trans-unit.target: 获取迭代器正在遍历的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that the iterator is traversing.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器正在遍历的容器。

trans-unit.source: Determines if two iterators are the same object.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个迭代器是否为同一对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> objects are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象为同一对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个迭代器为同一对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator to the next position in the underlying container, or to the first position beyond the end of container if the container has been completely traversed.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器递增到基础容器中的下一个位置，如果已完全遍历该容器，则递增到容器末尾以外的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to assign to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给当前对象的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 将给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象分配给当前对象。

trans-unit.source: The current object (<c>*this</c>).
trans-unit.target: 当前对象 (<c>*this</c>)。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递减一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递减一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This is the prefix version of the decrement operator.
trans-unit.target: 这是减量运算符的前缀版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: An unused parameter that indicates this is the postfix version of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 未使用的参数，用于指示这是运算符的后缀版本。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递减一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This is the postfix version of the decrement operator.
trans-unit.target: 这是减量运算符的后缀版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two iterators are the same object.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个迭代器是否为同一对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个迭代器为同一对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个迭代器为同一对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> to an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 转换为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The current iterator as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前迭代器，作为一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递增一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递增一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This is the prefix version of the increment operator.
trans-unit.target: 这是递增运算符的前缀版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器递增一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This is the postfix version of the increment operator.
trans-unit.target: 这是增量运算符的后缀版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two iterators are not the same object.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个迭代器是否为不同的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object differs from the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are different objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个迭代器是不同的对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object differs from the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 对象是否与当前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ContainerBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 对象不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are different objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个迭代器是不同的对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The iterator that the operator is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 应用该运算符的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 返回迭代器当前指向的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器当前指向的元素。

trans-unit.source: The iterator that the operator is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 应用该运算符的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 返回迭代器当前指向的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器当前指向的元素。

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator to the element immediately before the current element.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器定位到紧靠当前元素之前的元素。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the iterator is valid and can be safely used to traverse the underlying container.
trans-unit.target: 确定迭代器是否有效并可安全用于遍历基础容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the iterator is valid and safe to use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果迭代器有效并可安全使用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
